bibl.title: An Imperial Palace Guard in Heaven: The Date of the Vision of Dorotheus.
bibl.note: The vision of Dorotheus is an important source for the various grades and the uniform of the schola palatina. Those grades point to a date in the second half of the fourth century. - Pp. 87-88: Minima Dorotheana. Observations on lines 4, 131 and 168-177.
Bremmer Jan, An Imperial Palace Guard in Heaven: The Date of the Vision of Dorotheus.
